page.title: 13A Ladock Child's Day 8.7.85.
page.content: My name is Heidi. I got up at 8.00 am and got dressed. I got my breakfast of toast, cereal and coffee. At 8.55 I got to school and at 9.00 am{assembly started. At about 9.30 am we started {Maths.}I like Maths. At 10.40 we had our break and went back in at eleven o'clock. We then{wrote a story}until lunchtime at 12.00 noon. I had my usual{packed lunch}of a sandwich, crisps and some cakes or buns. At 12.40 we finished lunch and went out for the longest play of the day. At 1.15 pm we started our{topic work.}I was{testing}some{soil}from my square survey. At 2.30 pm we had our last play and afterwards at 2.45 pm we played continuous{cricket}on the field. When I got{home}I went out to play until{tea time.}I didn't have any homework and so I{played}until 8.00 pm
